column5: CLF squeeze

CLF If LG used the buyback and we are at 270 million shares the EV is at 4 billion right now The EVEBITDA ratio is below 5 A healthy company is at 10 or below Analysts like to value this industry at 75 times This would put clf share price around 1650 using Ragus 810 million ebitda estimate The uplift from HBI will add 240 million to EBITDA If we stay at these prices once HBI is fully ramped and EBITDA is at 105 billion then 75 times gets us to a share price of almost 23 Ill take the pain for now
